item.title: Man dies after suspected shark attack in Sydney
item.description: A morning surfer "died at the scene" after being pulled out of the water, Australian police say.

item.title: ICE raid on Hyundai plant in Georgia swept up workers on visitor visas
item.description: But one immigration lawyer in Atlanta says his clients were wrongly caught up in the raid.

item.title: Lisbon funicular worker among those killed in crash
item.description: Four employees of a non-profit organisation and a transport worker are among those who died.

item.title: Rosenberg: What's behind Putin's uncompromising stance?
item.description: Moscow's diplomatic success in China, and Trump's lack of action, have emboldened Putin, reports Steve Rosenberg.

item.title: Watch: What's in the 'missing minute' of Epstein's jail video?
item.description: The US House Oversight Committee has released new surveillance footage recorded hours before the convicted paedophile's death.
